tool_description: This API provides a way to fetch detailed information about a Spotify track. By providing the Spotify track link as a query parameter, you can retrieve details such as the song title, popularity, duration in seconds, artist information, download URL, YouTube URL, and preview URL
name: Spotify Downloader Api
title: Spotify Downloader Api

api_list.name: GetSpotifyUserInfo
api_list.description: This API allows you to retrieve information about Spotify tracks and their details.
